Reviews.Title: “If it looks like a hostel....and feels like a hostel....”
Reviews.Author: travelbugRNG
Reviews.Content: probably paying price hotel am surprised positive reviews walking reception maybe hotel renovation appeared hair bed hair shower ac cool lower floor window actually twice ac examined times appeared fixed warm sleep addition thin walls allowed hear person using bathroom blowing nose wifi connection iphones offered common location pay quiet convenient puerta del sol 1 min metro receptionists nice helpful recommend stay unless enjoy amongst masses tourist happy paying price departure happy asap morning stay own risk consider yourself warned

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: Traveling_Fool_2011
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews trip advisor read lots warnings noise paper thin walls inside facing busy street clean quiet located 20 paces sol metro stop absolutely perfect location basic beds shoved middle frills werent looking cheap clean close action thats exactly complaints

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff, great price!”

Reviews.Content: clean hotel hostel madrid change towels soap day real hotel friendly helpful staff map explained eat touristic location super 100 meters puerta del sol metro pictures site looks reality lucky quiet neighbours walls indeed paperthin checking hotels city feeling breakfast decide spot cheap breakfast menus cafés neighbourhood 5euro

Reviews.Title: “Excellent surprise - hot spot to be back”

Reviews.Content: book hotel 12 hours didnt found simple hotel clean excellent toilet complete silent sleep location excellent 1 minute del sol city center

Reviews.Content: reading reviews tripadvisor decided ahead booking hotel planned clubbing madrid night noise wouldn´t anyway hotel located close sol metro station close metro station walked past seeing sign clean comfortable shower strong nice air con appreciated location perfect time tourists receptionists stay hotel polite spoke english receptionist couldn´t speak english buy water check kept saying importantly hear noise street facing towards street neighbours night usually unhappy lower budget hotels stay definitely recommend hotel
